definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: He canoed the old man across the river.
sentences.chinese: 他用獨木舟把那位老人送過了河。

sentences.english: Their baggage was canoed across the river.
sentences.chinese: 他們的行李用獨木舟運過河去。

sentences.english: He crossed a lake in a canoe first then took a ship to sail on the canal.
sentences.chinese: 他先乘獨木舟渡過一個湖泊然後乘船在運河上航行。

sentences.english: The catchers were canoed back to their camp for up the river.
sentences.chinese: 捕獵者乘坐小獨木舟回到遠在河上游的營地。

sentences.english: If there are any argument or change, Tuen Mun Canoe Club will make the final judgment.
sentences.chinese: 改及爭議，以屯門獨木舟會最終決定爲準。

sentences.english: You can ride on the canal in a small boat called a canoe .
sentences.chinese: 你還可以在運河中乘坐叫做獨木舟的小船。

sentences.english: They circumnavigated cape horn island in canoes.
sentences.chinese: 他們乘獨木舟繞合恩角島航行。

sentences.english: We begin a 400-mile delightful canoe trip tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 明天早上，我們將繼續400英里的獨木舟航行。

sentences.english: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.chinese: 探險者們謹慎地把獨木舟向上遊劃去。

sentences.english: The paddler in the front of the canoe missed a stroke.
sentences.chinese: 獨木舟前的漿手漏了一漿。

sentences.english: We saw the canoe overturn, throwing its passengers into the water.
sentences.chinese: 我們看到獨木舟傾覆了，把上面的乘客掀入水中。

sentences.english: Sunlight and shadows highlight a river Bushman in a canoe in the Okavango River.
sentences.chinese: 陽光和陰影突出了奧卡萬戈河獨木舟上的布西曼族人。

sentences.english: Rowboats and canoes are often found on fairly placid lakes and streams.
sentences.chinese: 划艇和獨木舟往往被發現在平靜的湖泊和河流中。

definition: Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan
